div1.head: Letter from S.S. Goldwater to Albert E. Truby, May 4, 1935
div1.opener:
For Col Hench
DEPARTMENT OF HOSPITALS
City of New York
May 4, 1935.
S. S. Goldwater, M. D.
Commissioner.
Brigadier General Albert E. Truby, M. C.
Headquarters Army Medical Center
Washington, D. C.
Dear General Truby:
div1.p:
I am glad to be able to send you the
enclosed letters(Enc. 1 Enc. 2 Enc. 3 Enc. 4 ) about which you have every right to
be proud.
div1.closer:
Sincerely yours (Sgd.) S. S. GOLDWATER, M. D.
S. S. GOLDWATER,
C o m m i s s i o n e r. (Copy)
